name: BLIP (averygrisaille) (averygrisaille)
description:
Blip your way through two different universes in a difficult race to the finish line. Test your memory while blipping between worlds where any blip could be your last.

This is my first game created in Unity, using some Cainos Village assets along with assets I've created for the project. All music and sound for this project was done by Kai Karafotis. 

(TIP: holding down crouch gives you a huge jump boost.)

Enjoy!

assets used: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-platformer-village-props-166114
